title: Windows 11 Pro will require a Microsoft account to set up
content:
WIndows 11 Pro will start requiring a Microsoft account during setup in a future update, according to the changelog for the latest Dev channel buid. A Microsoft account has been required for Home editions since Windows 10, but Pro users could still set up a personal account without using their Microsoft account. As Microsoft noted

The post Windows 11 Pro will require a Microsoft account to set up appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft will be requiring Windows 11 Pro users to sign in with a Microsoft account during that setup in a future update.
